benchmark_details.name: UltraHorizon
benchmark_details.overview: UltraHorizon introduces a novel benchmark that measures foundational capabilities essential for complex real-world challenges, focusing on long-horizon, partially observable environments where agents must perform sustained reasoning, planning, and memory management.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the capabilities of language agents in long-horizon, partially observable environments.

data.source: Synthesized environments designed for the benchmark.

methodology.calculation: Scores calculated based on successful hypothesis discovery and rewards in various tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in uncovering hidden rules under long-horizon scenarios.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments with various state-of-the-art LLMs and human participants.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Research conducted in simulated settings; no sensitive data was used.
